member.name: T:crmSeries.Core.Features.Leads.Dtos.AddLeadDto
member.summary: The DTO object representing the data to add a lead.

member.name: P:crmSeries.Core.Features.Leads.Dtos.AddLeadDto.CompanyName
member.summary: The company name of the contact for this lead. Maximum length: 100

member.name: P:crmSeries.Core.Features.Leads.Dtos.AddLeadDto.Name
member.summary:
The leads name. Required field. Maximum length: 100
The API will convert this to firstName and lastName in the database if possible. If only one name is given, it will populate the firstName column of your database only.

member.name: P:crmSeries.Core.Features.Leads.Dtos.AddLeadDto.Phone
member.summary:
The lead's phone number. Maximum length: 20
Must be a valid US phone number or start with a ‘+’ and a country code for international numbers.
Required if a valid email is NOT submitted within the request body.

member.name: P:crmSeries.Core.Features.Leads.Dtos.AddLeadDto.Email
member.summary:
The lead's E-Mail. Maximum length: 100
Must be a valid E-Mail address.
Required if a valid phone is NOT submitted within the request body.

member.name: P:crmSeries.Core.Features.Leads.Dtos.AddLeadDto.Description
member.summary: The description of the lead. Maximum length: 250

member.name: P:crmSeries.Core.Features.Leads.Dtos.AddLeadDto.Address1
member.summary: The street address for the company of the contact for the lead. Maximum length: 100

member.name: P:crmSeries.Core.Features.Leads.Dtos.AddLeadDto.Address2
member.summary: The extra address information for the company of the contact for the lead. Maximum length: 100

member.name: P:crmSeries.Core.Features.Leads.Dtos.AddLeadDto.City
member.summary: The city for the company of the contact for the lead. Maximum length: 50

member.name: P:crmSeries.Core.Features.Leads.Dtos.AddLeadDto.State
member.summary: The state for the company of the contact for the lead. Maximum length: 50

member.name: P:crmSeries.Core.Features.Leads.Dtos.AddLeadDto.Zip
member.summary: The zip code for the company of the contact for this lead. Maximum length: 10

member.name: P:crmSeries.Core.Features.Leads.Dtos.AddLeadDto.County
member.summary: The county/parish for the company of the contact for this lead. Maximum length: 50

member.name: P:crmSeries.Core.Features.Leads.Dtos.AddLeadDto.Country
member.summary: The country for the company of the contact for this lead. Maximum length: 25

member.name: P:crmSeries.Core.Features.Leads.Dtos.AddLeadDto.Cell
member.summary:
The cell phone number of the contact for this lead. Maximum length: 20
Must be a valid US phone number or start with a ‘+’ and a country code for international numbers.

member.name: P:crmSeries.Core.Features.Leads.Dtos.AddLeadDto.Comments
member.summary: Comments submitted by the contact for this lead.

member.name: P:crmSeries.Core.Features.Leads.Dtos.AddLeadDto.CompanyPhone
member.summary:
The phone number for the company of the contact for this lead. Maximum length: 100
Must be a valid US phone number or start with a ‘+’ and a country code for international numbers.

member.name: P:crmSeries.Core.Features.Leads.Dtos.AddLeadDto.Web
member.summary:
The web site URL for the company of the contact for this lead. Maximum length: 200
Must be a valid, well-formed URI string.

member.name: P:crmSeries.Core.Features.Leads.Dtos.AddLeadDto.Fax
member.summary:
The fax number for the company of the contact for this lead. Maximum length: 50
Must be a valid US phone number or start with a ‘+’ and a country code for international numbers.

member.name: P:crmSeries.Core.Features.Leads.Dtos.AddLeadDto.Title
member.summary: The title of the contact for this lead (e.g., Mr., Mrs., Dr., etc.) Maximum length: 10

member.name: P:crmSeries.Core.Features.Leads.Dtos.AddLeadDto.Position
member.summary: The name of the position in the company of the contact for this lead. Maximum length: 100

member.name: P:crmSeries.Core.Features.Leads.Dtos.AddLeadDto.Department
member.summary: The department of the company that the contact for this lead works in. Maximum length: 100

member.name: P:crmSeries.Core.Features.Leads.Dtos.AddLeadDto.FirstName
member.summary: The first name of the contact for this lead. Maximum length: 50

member.name: P:crmSeries.Core.Features.Leads.Dtos.AddLeadDto.LastName
member.summary: The last name of the contact for this lead. Maximum length: 50

member.name: P:crmSeries.Core.Features.Workflows.ExecuteWorkflowRuleRequest.Module
member.summary: The type of module we are executing the workflow against.

member.name: P:crmSeries.Core.Features.Workflows.ExecuteWorkflowRuleRequest.EntityId
member.summary: The identifier of the entity for the type of module. For example, if the module is leads, this represents the identifier for a specific lead.

member.name: P:crmSeries.Core.Features.Workflows.ExecuteWorkflowRuleRequest.ActionType
member.summary: The type of action for this workflow. Examples include "Created" and "Edited"

member.name: M:crmSeries.Core.Features.Workflows.ExecuteWorkflowRuleHandler.HandleTasks(crmSeries.Core.Features.Workflows.ExecuteWorkflowRuleRequest,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Int32})
member.summary: If any tasks are set to be added to a user given this module and action type, this will add them.

member.name: M:crmSeries.Core.Features.Workflows.ExecuteWorkflowRuleHandler.HandleEmails(crmSeries.Core.Features.Workflows.ExecuteWorkflowRuleRequest,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Int32})
member.summary: Sends any emails that need to be sent for this module's action.

member.name: M:crmSeries.Core.Features.Workflows.ExecuteWorkflowRuleHandler.ReplaceEmailFields(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},crmSeries.Core.Features.Workflows.ExecuteWorkflowRuleRequest)
member.summary: Takes an email template and replaces placeholder strings with their proper values.

member.name: M:crmSeries.Core.Features.Workflows.ExecuteWorkflowRuleHandler.ReplaceModuleFields(System.String,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Replaces placeholder strings in an email template with the entity's fields for the entity's type.

member.name: M:crmSeries.Core.Features.Workflows.ExecuteWorkflowRuleHandler.GetEmailBody(System.Int32)
member.summary: Queries the EmailTemplate table and returns a matching html template for the module.

member.name: M:crmSeries.Core.Features.Workflows.ExecuteWorkflowRuleHandler.GetEmailAddresses(System.Collections.Generic.ICollection{System.Int32})
member.summary: Queries the User table and returns a list of email addresses for matching users

member.name: M:crmSeries.Core.Features.Workflows.ExecuteWorkflowRuleHandler.GetUserIdsForEmail(crmSeries.Core.Features.Workflows.ExecuteWorkflowRuleRequest,System.Int32)
member.summary: Queries the WorkflowRuleAssignment table and returns the AssignmentObjectID as the UserID

member.name: M:crmSeries.Core.Features.Workflows.ExecuteWorkflowRuleHandler.GetUserIds(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Queries the GetWorkflowRuleUserAssignments sproc and returns a list of User IDs for users that have a WorkFlowRuleAssignmen for the provided task

member.name: M:crmSeries.Core.Features.Workflows.ExecuteWorkflowRuleHandler.GetEmails(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Int32})
member.summary: Queries the WorkflowRuleEmail table and returns email template IDs for the specified conditionIds

member.name: M:crmSeries.Core.Features.Workflows.ExecuteWorkflowRuleHandler.GetConditionIds(crmSeries.Core.Features.Workflows.ExecuteWorkflowRuleRequest)
member.summary: Queries the WorkflowRuleMatch sproc and returns a list of conditionIDs that match the given module and action type

member.name: M:crmSeries.Core.Features.Workflows.ExecuteWorkflowRuleHandler.GetTasks(System.Collections.Generic.ICollection{System.Int32})
member.summary: Queries the WorkflowRuleTask table and returns WorkflowRuleTasks matching the specified conditionIds

member.name: T:crmSeries.Core.Logic.Queries.PagedQueryRequest
member.summary: Request object for a paginated list of results.

member.name: P:crmSeries.Core.Logic.Queries.PagedQueryRequest.PageNumber
member.summary: The page number for the paginated results. Setting a number beyond the last page will just return the last page of data.

member.name: F:crmSeries.Core.Logic.Queries.PagedQueryRequest._pageSize
member.summary: The number of items returned for the page. Maximum size of 100.
